activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12529
activity.text:
I would like to take up this issue.

The current form treats both `password` and `c_password` fields as optional, which leads to unexpected behavior â€” specifically, when submitting without a password, focus shifts to `c_password` instead of `password`.

I will update the `Zod` schema used with `useForm`:
- Make `password` and `c_password` required when `password_setup_method === 'immediate'` and `!isEditMode`
- Use `z.string().min(8)` for field-level validation to trigger focus properly
- Ensure error messages are clear and correctly mapped

This will ensure both fields behave like other required fields and focus logic works as expected.
